mapper.select: SELECT C.CHILDREN_NAME,C.CHILDREN_NO,C.BIRTH,C.GENDER,C.USER_NO FROM CHILDREN C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE C.CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT C.CHILDREN_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS C WHERE (KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE) IN ( SELECT K.KINDER_NO,K.CLASS_NAME,K.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K JOIN USERS U ON K.TEACHER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE K.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNo} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)) AND C.DIVISION = '원생')

select count(*) from( SELECT C.CHILDREN_NAME,C.CHILDREN_NO,C.BIRTH,C.GENDER,C.USER_NO FROM CHILDREN C JOIN USERS U ON U.USER_NO = C.USER_NO WHERE C.CHILDREN_NO IN (SELECT C.CHILDREN_NO FROM KINDER_CLASS C WHERE (KINDER_NO,CLASS_NAME,OPENED_DATE) IN ( SELECT K.KINDER_NO,K.CLASS_NAME,K.OPENED_DATE FROM KINDER_CLASS K JOIN USERS U ON K.TEACHER_NO = U.USER_NO WHERE K.TEACHER_NO = #{teacherNo} AND SUBSTR(OPENED_DATE,1,2) = SUBSTR(SYSDATE,1,2)) AND C.DIVISION = '원생') )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE ATT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{date},'YY/MM/DD') AND CHILDREN_NO = #{childrenNo}
